name: vpet
description: A cross-platform virtual pet application inspired by Digimon and traditional virtual pets

scripts.prebuild: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p www && cp -r index.html style.css pet.js battle.js server.js app.js premium.js manifest.json sw.js icons www/
scripts.build:quick: mkdir -p www && cp -r index.html style.css pet.js battle.js server.js app.js premium.js manifest.json sw.js icons www/
scripts.android:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
